name: Normal Attack
content1: Unleash a well-measured melee attack to inflict damage to a single target.
content3: Feel free to flavor this attack to something appropriate to your character; whether that's a kick, a swing of your sword, or something else.

name: Heavy Attack
content1: Unleash a powerful melee attack to deal significant damage to a single target.
content3: Feel free to flavor this attack to something appropriate to your character; whether that's a kick, a swing of your sword, or something else.

name: Drop Prone
content3: Use the crawl action to move while prone.

name: Interact
content3: This covers anything from pushing a box to a button, to pulling a lever or a door.

name: Block
content1: Brace against incoming damage, diminishing the force of the assault.
content2:
Trigger:
You are about to take damage from an attack and you are aware of it.

Effect:
Reduce the power of the attack used against you by 50

name: Dodge
content1: Attempt to avoid an incoming attack with quick reflexes.
content2:
Trigger:
You are about to take damage from an attack and you are aware of it.

Contest:
Coordination vs Accuracy

Success:
Negate the attack
content3: The default Accuracy for any given attack is 0 unless otherwise stated.

name: Grab Break
content1: Attempt to prevent an opponent from grappling you.
content2:
Trigger:
You are about to take damage from an attack and you are aware of it.

Prediction:
You anticipate a grab-style attack.

Success:
Target's attack fails and your reaction is refunded.
content3: Keep an eye on what moves your oppent favors and use this reaction to counter them.

name: Surprise Attack
content1: You deal more damage when you catch an opponent off guard.
content2:
Requirement:
The Target of the modified ability is unaware of the userâ€™s presence.

Success:
Increase the Power of the modified ability by 100.

Failure:
The modified ability deals normal damage.
content3: Be sure to use this modifier when you catch your opponent off guard.

name: Non-Lethal
content1: Modify an ability to reduce the chance of severly injuring an opponent.
content2:
Effect:
Decrease the Power of the modified ability by 50.

Effect:
Damage from the modified ability will never cause hard damage.
content3: Use this modifier when you want to deal damage, but not cause hard damage.

name: Struggle
content1: Attempt to break free from a hold.
content3: Dynamic Contests are based on the situation and the characters involved. Your DM will determine the contest.

name: Throw
content1: Attempt to throw a target you're restraining.
content2:
Requirement:
You are restraining the target.

Contest:
Physique vs Physique

Success:
You throw your target a short distance and knock them prone.

Failure:
You throw your target a short distance but fail to knock them prone.

Formula:
Distance = Physique + Your Size - Target's Size
content3: Throwing your target into a nearby object or hazard can trigger additional effects. Consult with your DM to determine what effects, if any, would be triggered.

name: Tackle
content1: Run and attempt to tackle an opponent.
content2:
Requirement:
Your target's position is no closer than 3 units to you and no further than double your Speed away from you.

Contest:
Physique vs Physique

Success:
You move to your target and tackle them, causing both of you to fall prone.

Failure:
You move to your target but fail to tackle them.
content3: Tackling your target into a nearby object or hazard can trigger additional effects for the both of you. Consult with your DM to determine what effects, if any, would be triggered.

name: Human Shield
content1: Attempt to use a restrained target's body as a shield yourself from an attack.
content2:
Trigger:
You are the target of an attacking while restraining an actor.

Contest:
Physique vs Physique

Success:
The restrained actor takes 100% of the damage from the attack.

Failure:
The restrained actor takes 50% of the damage from the attack.
content3: Your enemies may find this tactic cruel, but it's a great way to protect yourself and discourage your enemies from attacking you.

name: Shove
content1: Attempt to push an opponent away from you.
content2:
Contest:
Physique vs Physique

Success:
You push your target a few spaces away from you.

Formula:
Distance = Physique + Your Size - Target's Size
content3: Shoving your target into a nearby object or hazard can trigger additional effects. Consult with your DM to determine what effects, if any, would be triggered.
